ValidationRule.description: Internal Needs Analysis Review is a required field when "Current Step" field is (3 of 12) or greater
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(NOT(ISPICKVAL(Current_Step__c,'(1 of 12) Sales Rep Conducting Needs Analysis')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Current_Step__c,'(2 of 12) Internal Review of Needs Analysis/Demo Strategy')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Current_Step__c,'Onboarding Complete')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Current_Step__c,'')), ISBLANK(Internal_Needs_Analysis_Review__c))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Internal Needs Analysis Review is a required field when "Current Step" field is (3 of 12) or greater
